login.title: Access your account
login.description: See your balances and transactions, make payments and accumulate benefits!
login.confirmedEmail: Email confirmed successfully! You may now access your account.

errors.notConfirmed: This email was not confirmed yet.
errors.invalidCredentials: The email and/or password are not valid.
errors.unkownError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

register.title: Register
register.description: With a Quivi account you can save your billing details and speed up future payments!
register.confirmationPendingDescription: Access your email and follow the steps to activate your account.

resetPassword.title: New password
resetPassword.successDescription: Password changed successfully! You can now access your account:

confirmEmail.title: Confirming email
confirmEmail.confirmingYourEmailDescription: Please stand by while we confirm your email address. After confirmation, you will be able to sign in and access Quivi.
confirmEmail.confirmedDescription: You can now have full access to benefits of using Quivi! Login below to continue.
confirmEmail.tokenExpiredDescription: Your email could not be confirmed since the link already expired. We sent you another fresh link. Please check your inbox for another link.

forgotPassword.title: Recover password
forgotPassword.description: Enter the email associated with your account to get the password reset link.
forgotPassword.failed: An error occured. Please check if the email is correct.
forgotPassword.successDescription: Access your email and follow the steps to reset yout password.

inactivity.description: Due to inactivity we will clear your session in <bold>{{seconds}}</bold> seconds. Interact with the page to continue your session.

editProfile.title: Personal information
editProfile.failed: It was not possible to complete this request. Please try again later.

userHome.title: Home
userHome.soon: Soon you will be able to earn loyalty cards and accumulate balance in your account!
userHome.noCard1: You don't have a loyalty card yet.
userHome.noCard2: Start making payments at accepting restaurants to accumulate balance in your digital wallet!

home.choiceTitle: What do you wish to do?
home.requestFailed2: Please scan the QR Code again.
home.menuLanguageModalTitle: In which language do you want the menu?
home.inactiveMerchantWarn: The merchant has disabled this link

scanQrCode.title: Pay your bill in less than 10 seconds!
scanQrCode.step1: Click the button to open your camera
scanQrCode.step2: Point the camera to the QR code
scanQrCode.step3: Check your bill and finish the payment.

pay.title: Payment

notMyBillModal.description: Do you want to clear all items from the bill and start over?

pay.onlyRequiringApprovalAmountAvailable: The unpaid amount refers only to items pending staff approval. You will be able to pay it after it has been approved
pay.sessionHasUpdates: Session was updated! The things you were trying to pay are no longer available or were already paid.
pay.emptySessionDescription: There is still no information about orders or bills in this session.
pay.syncError: It's not possible to obtain your bill. Tell an employee that you want to pay your bill through Quivi.
pay.shareBillTitle: How will you split the bill?
pay.peopleOnTableQuestion: For how many people will you divide?
pay.payForPeopleQuestion: For how many people will you pay?
pay.overPayAlert: The amount entered is greater than the pending amount of this session.

paymentMethods.confirmPaymentQuestion: Do you confirm to accept paying the amount above?
paymentMethods.tipRecallDescription: Show the restaurant how much you enjoyed the experience!
paymentMethods.enabledMethodsFailed: Something went wrong. Please go back and try again.
paymentMethods.paymentFailed: Something went wrong and the payment was not completed. Please try again.
paymentMethods.serviceFeeInfo: Quivi will charge the user a service fee for using the platform in order to continuously improve the overall services, providing a convenience service and continuously improving the user experience, among others.
paymentMethods.expired: The payment expired. Please try again.
paymentMethods.processingPaymentDescription: Some banks may require you to authorize the payment. If that's the case, a page will be open and you should:
paymentMethods.acceptPaymentDescription: To complete the payment, follow the steps below:
paymentMethods.importantDescription1: To receive payment requests, you should have
paymentMethods.importantDescription2: active and with balance. If you didn't receive the notification, check that you have notifications active in your smartphone.
paymentMethods.applePayUnavailable: Apple Pay is only available in Safari browser
paymentMethods.merchantCustomPaymentNotes: After your payment and before leave, please kindly ask our staff for confirmation of the transaction.
paymentMethods.walletUnavailable: Pay faster with Quivi wallet! Register and login to be able to use it.

paymentTerminal.title: Payment via terminal
paymentTerminal.description: Follow the instructions on the terminal to complete the payment
paymentTerminal.sendingPayment: Sending payment information to the terminal...

acquirer.mustSpecifyCardNumber: You must specify a valid card number.
acquirer.mustSpecifyCVV: You must specify a valid CVV.
acquirer.mustSpecifyExpiryDate: You must specify a valid expiry date.
acquirer.invalidData: The provided payment details are not valid.

paymentResult.paymentCompletedDescription: Your payment was successfully sent to merchant. The remainder total of {{pendingAmount}} is left.
paymentResult.verifyingPayment: Your payment was received! Please stand-by while we communicate with the merchant...
paymentResult.soonDescription: With a Quivi account, you can save your information to complete purchases faster and soon you will be able to accumulate balance in your digital wallet.
paymentResult.syncFailed: It was not possible to communicate your payment to the merchant, but your payment has been collected. Communicate to an employee to resolve the situation.
paymentResult.externalLinksTitle: Review us also at our pages:
paymentResult.registerTeaser: Do you want to pay even faster?
paymentResult.reviewThanks: Thank you for helping us improve!
paymentResult.gettingInvoice: We are retrieving your invoice from the merchant
paymentResult.noInvoiceAvailable: The merchant failed to provide us an invoice

orderAndPayResult.screenWillBeKeptUpdated: The screen will be kept updated.

expandedMenu.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

cart.title: Order
cart.cartIsEmptyDesc: Please check the menu and add create your order.
cart.mixedPaymentDescription: Your order has a mix between pre-paid and pay later items. Please remove items of one of those payment methods to continue.
cart.confirmSubmissionDescription: This order is about to be sent for preparation. Do you confirm this order?

validations.InvalidPhoneNumber: You must specify a phone number with format 912 345 678.

validations.InvalidValue: This provided value is not valid.
validations.PaymentFailed: Couldn't process payment, please veryfy your details and try again later.

page1.title: 100% Cashback
page1.description: On your first payment with Mastercard®, 100%* of the amount will credited on your Quivi wallet.
page1.disclaimer: * Any payment starting from {{minEligibleAmount}}. Maximum cashback limit of {{maxCashbackAmount}}. Campaign terms and conditions.

topup.title: You just earned
topup.description: on your wallet with the Mastercard® campaign. Enjoy it on future purchases with Quivi.

mastercardCampaign.enterEmailToBeElligible: Required to be elligible for Mastercard® campaign
